main event: A round, silvery-white object with streamers was observed moving in a straight line in Hillsboro, Texas on January 1, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as silvery-white and round,Streamers were reported protruding from the rear of the object,The observers noted the object moving on a level path to the west at 11:16,The conclusion of the report indicates the sighting was probably caused by balloon activity,The sighting was part of Project Blue Book which documented UFO reports.
